title: Power Cut schedule for Thursday (24)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) granted the approval for the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) to disrupt the supply of electricity on Thursday (Mar. 24) as well.
Accordingly, Groups A – L, will experience a three-hour-and-20-minute power cut between 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM and one-hour-and-40-minute power cut between 6:00 PM to 11:00 PM.
Groups P – W will experience a four-hour-and-30-minute power cut between 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM and one-hour-and-50-minute power cut between 5:30 PM to 11:00 PM.
